last_episode_to_air.name: Setting the Trap
last_episode_to_air.overview: As Robert continues to exploit and ruin lives, the authorities set a trap in London.  Meanwhile, in the present, Sandra's children hold out hope.

name: The Puppet Master: Hunting the Ultimate Conman
original_name: The Puppet Master: Hunting the Ultimate Conman
overview: This harrowing docuseries explores, a cruel conman masquerading as a British spy manipulates and steals from his victims, leaving ruined families in his wake.

episodes.name: They Vanished
episodes.overview: In 1993, Robert convinces his college friends he's an MI5 agent.  Decades later, a man named David exerts an extreme level of control over a family.

episodes.name: Chasing a Ghost
episodes.overview: The father of an early victim raises the alarm with authorities about his daughter's safety.  Decades later, the police chase down a bizarre lead.

episodes.name: Setting the Trap
episodes.overview: As Robert continues to exploit and ruin lives, the authorities set a trap in London.  Meanwhile, in the present, Sandra's children hold out hope.
